attributes.action: Request the resignation of Rowan Williams the Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Archbishop has shown an incredible lack of understanding of the impact of Sharia Law and the lack of status it allows women - it is not the solution to promoting an understanding society. Sharia law was veto-ed by the EEC as it does not uphold the basic tenants of human rights.
Holding the position of Archbishop gives him the opportunity to defend these human rights - he has failed in a spectacular manner - it is time to give the opportunity to someone else.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
